role.argrole: thing arg0 keeps in good care

example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 谈起) (NP-OBJ (NN 前尘) (NN 往事)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (PN 他)) (VP (VV 搬出) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VA 珍藏) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 老)) (NP (NN 照片)))))
